attributes.action: Return Abdelbaset Ali Mohmed Al Megrahi to the UK
attributes.additional_details: In light of the recent raid and killing of Osama Bin Laden, the 'Seal Team 6' Squad sent for this job in Pakistan and noting how the US if desperate enough would send this squad in to retrieve Megrahi - We the undersigned do hereby wish to have Megrahi returned to the United Kingdom under protection from the United States inhumane treatment within prisons and if returned would hereby be placed under a government 24/7 surveillance program with continual monitoring.

rejection.details: This request should be submitted to the Scottish Parliament Public Petition website. http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/vli/publicinfo/htsapp/Index.htm
